text: When updating a module in a child theme is there a way for the images referenced in the fields to pull from the parent theme? I noticed if I don't have the images in my child theme I am unable to add a reusable section. Is there something I can add to the src to make it inherit from the parent?
This is the src I have in the child theme - "src": "{{ get_asset_url('../images/placeholder/landscape.jpg') }}"
